definition: senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning

sentences.english: Your condescension, as always, is much appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 像往常一樣，你的屈尊俯就總是讓人感激。

sentences.english: Yeltsin was polite and friendly, but slightly patronizing.
sentences.chinese: 葉利欽很客氣，很友好，稍微有點屈尊俯就的架勢。

sentences.english: Don’t be condescending, but do use simpler words when they are available.
sentences.chinese: 不要顯得屈尊俯就，但要儘量用簡明的詞語。
